attributes.action: Consider removing the 'bus only' lanes onto and over Wandsworth, Battersea and Chelsea bridges, during the closure of Albert bridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The closure of Albert bridge for the next 18 months has already put a great strain on other bridges over the Thames.
This is a main arterial bridge serving the communities of the South and North. 
Traffic jams have increased 4 fold, with average delays of around 45 minutes for the same journeys, during peak times. 
By allowing the use of the bus lanes of the surrounding bridges,  journey times may decrease by as much as half to a more acceptable level.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
